page.title: 07HOUSING IN WESTCOTT
page.content: Houses in Westcott and Wotton vary greatly in age/style/quality/price etc. Prices range from{Â£42,950}for a 2-bedroomed terraced property to {Â£175,000}for a 6-bedroomed house with swimming pool, tennis court and garage space for up to 9 cars. A majority of those properties offered for sale in June 1985 were in the price range{Â£50-100,000.}Only those people with high incomes can pay such prices and therefore not everyone can afford to live in the area. A survey of opinion in{St Johns Road {Westcott}asked the question - "What do you most dislike about living here?" A common response to this question complained about the lack of transport which prevented shopping trips to Guildford and other main shopping centres. People also complained about traffic noise.
